name: One Last Meal
description:
This is a visual novel we made for the Toadhouse Visual Novel Game Jam (2021)!

In One Last Meal you get to have your own food cart and cook for customers who seem to have no memory of how they've showed up at your cart!


You meet three characters and you get to have deep conversations with them about their lives or just people in general!

Content Warnings

[Click to view; potential spoilers]
  • Death
The Team

Writer, Character Artist & Story Programmer - Swati Mallya (makkurataichou)

Writer, Background Artist & Story Programmer - Nader Youssef (mickehh)

Composer, Sound Designer & Audio Programmer - Maskedsound
